rows: Generates a personalized call script for a Business Development Representative to prepare them for a meeting with a client at the Discovery stage. Enables business development representatives to prepare for calls quickly and work as efficiently as possible.

Provides a detailed explanation of the aspects that affect the lead's probability score and their impact.Sales Lead PrioritizationGenerates descriptions for lead scoring criteria to help sales teams identify and prioritize the most valuable leads based on factors such as engagement level, industry fit, and potential revenue. Enhances the efficiency of sales teams by focusing on high-potential leads. This leads to better allocation of resources and improved conversion rates.With details on the calculation criteria used and their indicators for a particular lead, the manager can easily understand the areas to focus on, what information can be used on the lead to take the successful next steps in preparing and making a sale. It lets you understand and assess how close a potential customer is to the ideal target customer profile and more accurately assess its potential.This lets you reduce the time it takes to find the necessary important details for a lead and to prepare for calls, meetings, and proposals more efficiently.CRM Lead ManagementHelps CRM managers establish clear lead scoring guidelines within the system. This provides a structured approach to qualify leads based on historical data and behavioral indicators.Improves CRM systems by providing a standardized approach to lead scoring. This makes lead management more efficient and data-driven.

Generates a summary of a lead.Sales handover efficiencySimplifies the transition between sales team members by generating summaries of key lead details and interactions. This ensures smooth handovers. The AI Skill helps minimize the risk of missed information and keeps the team aligned with lead progress. This enhances collaboration and accuracy during handovers.Quick decision-making for sales associatesEnhances the ability of sales associates to prioritize leads quickly and focus on the most promising opportunities as well as track progress and identify the next steps. This improves overall sales performance, lead management, conversion rates, and response times.

Generates a summary of an opportunity.Quick decision-making for sales associatesBy offering concise summaries of leads and opportunities, this AI Skill empowers sales managers to make quick, informed decisions about prioritizing leads and identifying high-potential opportunities. It streamlines the decision-making process, reducing time spent manually gathering and analyzing data.Opportunity MonitoringSales associates and their managers can monitor the status and development of opportunities by getting real-time insights and updates. This ensures that teams are always aware of changes in lead status and can respond proactively to emerging opportunities.Keeps teams updated on changes in lead and opportunity status, ensuring timely responses and proactive engagement with potential customers.
Lead and Opportunity Management + Productivity, both are required

Generates personalized recommendations for a Sales Executive to prepare them for a meeting with a client at the Opportunity stage. Enables sales executives to prepare for meetings quickly and work as efficiently as possible.
Lead and Opportunity Management + Productivity, both are required

Generates a personalized agenda for a client meeting, based on the Opportunity data and user input. Includes relevant topics, key agenda items, and suggested next steps. Enables sales executives to personalize their approach quickly and easily, all while staying relevant and effective.
Generates a short description for the Product and saves it in the corresponding field. Enables copywriters to generate effective copy as quickly as possible.
Order and Contract Management + Customer 360, both are required
Generates product recommendations and sends a tailored offer to the customer. Enables sales associates to suggest products and upsell or cross-sell the customer quickly and easily.

Extracts and updates opportunity data from meeting transcripts, including contract value, close date, decision maker, customer needs, and customer perspective details.Automated Data CaptureExtracts opportunity data directly from email conversations, meeting transcripts, and other communication records without manual intervention.Faster Sales CyclesKey opportunity data is auto-filled from conversations, reducing manual updates and accelerating deal progression.Better ForecastingUpdated deal values and close dates improve pipeline predictability and forecast accuracy.Complete Deal VisibilityAdds missing contacts, products, or decision makers to the opportunity for a comprehensive view.Email IntegrationWorks seamlessly with email generation and communication workflows to capture opportunity insights from all customer touchpoints.Preview and ControlProvides a preview of suggested updates before applying changes, allowing sales teams to review and approve enrichment data.Time SavingsSales representatives spend less time on CRM data entry and more time on selling activities.Can improve the sales cycle speed, forecast accuracy, pipeline visibility, CRM data quality, and email-to-opportunity conversion rate KPIs.
html:
Name

Apps

Description and use cases

Mode

Version

Generate lead call script

Lead and Opportunity Management

Generates a personalized call script for a Business Development Representative to prepare them for a meeting with a client at the Discovery stage. Enables business development representatives to prepare for calls quickly and work as efficiently as possible.

Chat

8.2.1 Energy and later

Provide lead probability insights

Lead and Opportunity Management

Provides a detailed explanation of the aspects that affect the lead's probability score and their impact.

Sales Lead Prioritization

Generates descriptions for lead scoring criteria to help sales teams identify and prioritize the most valuable leads based on factors such as engagement level, industry fit, and potential revenue. Enhances the efficiency of sales teams by focusing on high-potential leads. This leads to better allocation of resources and improved conversion rates.

With details on the calculation criteria used and their indicators for a particular lead, the manager can easily understand the areas to focus on, what information can be used on the lead to take the successful next steps in preparing and making a sale. It lets you understand and assess how close a potential customer is to the ideal target customer profile and more accurately assess its potential.

This lets you reduce the time it takes to find the necessary important details for a lead and to prepare for calls, meetings, and proposals more efficiently.

CRM Lead Management

Helps CRM managers establish clear lead scoring guidelines within the system. This provides a structured approach to qualify leads based on historical data and behavioral indicators.

Improves CRM systems by providing a standardized approach to lead scoring. This makes lead management more efficient and data-driven.

Chat

8.2 Energy and later

Summarize lead

Lead and Opportunity Management

Generates a summary of a lead.

Sales handover efficiency

Simplifies the transition between sales team members by generating summaries of key lead details and interactions. This ensures smooth handovers. The AI Skill helps minimize the risk of missed information and keeps the team aligned with lead progress. This enhances collaboration and accuracy during handovers.

Quick decision-making for sales associates

Enhances the ability of sales associates to prioritize leads quickly and focus on the most promising opportunities as well as track progress and identify the next steps. This improves overall sales performance, lead management, conversion rates, and response times.

Chat

8.2 Energy and later

Summarize opportunity

Lead and Opportunity Management

Generates a summary of an opportunity.

Quick decision-making for sales associates

By offering concise summaries of leads and opportunities, this AI Skill empowers sales managers to make quick, informed decisions about prioritizing leads and identifying high-potential opportunities. It streamlines the decision-making process, reducing time spent manually gathering and analyzing data.

Opportunity Monitoring

Sales associates and their managers can monitor the status and development of opportunities by getting real-time insights and updates. This ensures that teams are always aware of changes in lead status and can respond proactively to emerging opportunities.

Keeps teams updated on changes in lead and opportunity status, ensuring timely responses and proactive engagement with potential customers.

Chat

8.2 Energy and later

Prepare for the meeting

Lead and Opportunity Management + Productivity, both are required

Generates personalized recommendations for a Sales Executive to prepare them for a meeting with a client at the Opportunity stage. Enables sales executives to prepare for meetings quickly and work as efficiently as possible.

Chat

8.2.1 Energy and later

Prepare meeting agenda

Lead and Opportunity Management + Productivity, both are required

Generates a personalized agenda for a client meeting, based on the Opportunity data and user input. Includes relevant topics, key agenda items, and suggested next steps. Enables sales executives to personalize their approach quickly and easily, all while staying relevant and effective.

Chat

8.2.1 Energy and later

Generate product description

Order and Contract Management

Generates a short description for the Product and saves it in the corresponding field. Enables copywriters to generate effective copy as quickly as possible.

Chat

8.2.1 Energy and later

Generate product description API

API

Recommend products

Order and Contract Management + Customer 360, both are required

Generates product recommendations and sends a tailored offer to the customer. Enables sales associates to suggest products and upsell or cross-sell the customer quickly and easily.

Chat

8.2.1 Energy and later

Enrich opportunity

Lead and Opportunity Management

Extracts and updates opportunity data from meeting transcripts, including contract value, close date, decision maker, customer needs, and customer perspective details.

Automated Data Capture

Extracts opportunity data directly from email conversations, meeting transcripts, and other communication records without manual intervention.

Faster Sales Cycles

Key opportunity data is auto-filled from conversations, reducing manual updates and accelerating deal progression.

Better Forecasting

Updated deal values and close dates improve pipeline predictability and forecast accuracy.

Complete Deal Visibility

Adds missing contacts, products, or decision makers to the opportunity for a comprehensive view.

Email Integration

Works seamlessly with email generation and communication workflows to capture opportunity insights from all customer touchpoints.

Preview and Control

Provides a preview of suggested updates before applying changes, allowing sales teams to review and approve enrichment data.

Time Savings

Sales representatives spend less time on CRM data entry and more time on selling activities.

Can improve the sales cycle speed, forecast accuracy, pipeline visibility, CRM data quality, and email-to-opportunity conversion rate KPIs.

Chat

8.3.0 Twin and later
